website_summaries.verdict: The dining bench for the whole family. Extra width provides plenty of space for children and adults alike around the dinner table.
pros: The padded leather surface of the dining bench is consistently comfortable from end to end
Leather resists staining and food spills
cons: Dining bench is heavy and awkward to move around

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and just the right touch
customer_reviews.text: So elegant and just the right size. Very sturdy. Looks great at the foot of my king size bed. I like the length and its not to wide like some benches
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench!!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!!! The bench is well made, sturdy, looks expensive, is the perfect height and length, and is very comfortable. So easy to assemble - took less than 5 min. Quality bench for a remarkable price!!!
customer_reviews.author: CarrieBrewer

customer_reviews.title: Great...except for the buttons!!!
customer_reviews.text: The bench is very sturdy and looks beautiful. The only problem is the buttons. They are pulling off the bench and it's only a matter of time before the strings breaks and the buttons pull all of the way off. AND we've only had the bench 1 week. Disappointing considering the rest of the bench is great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Roomy bench!
customer_reviews.text: Dang this bench is awesome! It's bigger than some Ive seen that cost more. My husband (195lb) myself(185lb) and our 3 year old all sat comfortably. The cushion is nice as well! A steal if you ask me
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as pictured. Very nice and tall. I bought it to go at the end of the bed but I think it was designed for sitting at a dining table so something to consider if you're short like me. My only concern is I feel like if I sit in the middle it will break. Both my husband and I have sat down and heard a crack like sound of distress although there is none to be seen so we just sit closer to the edges. Not sure the weight limit. Otherwise is a beautiful addition as it matches my furniture. Feels very sturdy and solid aside from the prior mention.
customer_reviews.author: Itsabreez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love they way it oooks and feel! It's perfect for my growing family. Its a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Eloisa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This bench completes my 6-person dining set. I used my existing 4 chairs from my round dining table. It perfectly matches the table which I also bought from Amazon and the 4 chairs. I saved money by not buying an entire new dining set.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardorey

customer_reviews.title: STURDY and GOOD LOOKING !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking ,well made . Only took 10 minutes to put together and comes with a allen wrench tool to assemble it . You can't beat the price . In a store it would cost you double the price ( $ 150,00 ) . Will seat probably 2 children and one adult . Purchased it for extra seating at the kitchen table as a farm house bench ,so now when 2 grand kids come over everyone has a place to sit at the table , love it !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Leary

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, But..
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful bench. The only issue, they sent 4 screws, in addition to the others, that will NOT go in. The holes are too big or something. So, we were still able to put it together, we can/do use it.. But you can feel that it's not stable, like it should be. So, we're using it as a foot-rest in our living room VS a kitchen bench. Which IS why we bought it lol. Oh well, at least it matches our living room furniture pretty well. If it wasn't so bulky, a big pain-in-the-butt to have taken apart, tried to re-package, ect.. We probably would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Saj

customer_reviews.title: Beat the local stores hands down!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this may be one of the best purchases I ever made. I actually bought two and used them at an annual Easter family event. The benches were tested by rambunctious grandkids, heavier adults, and the more mature members of the family. The benches did their job very well. I'd buy more in a heartbeat if I needed more seating!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M Schlicht

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This bench was a return sent back out or the quality control isn't doing too well at Ashley Furniture. I would have returned it but Amazon said this was the last one and because I am disabled, it would be very hard to return. There were scratches on the legs that I had to repair. The package containing the hardware was open and the allen wrench was missing from it. One of the bolt heads had been partially stripped out. I'll probably not be buying Ashley furniture again of any type.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepers

customer_reviews.title: Imbalanced and accessories (buttons) coming off already.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what I expected. I thought Ashley furniture should be quality furniture but unfortunately it is not. First of all, four legs are not balanced so it doesn't stay put on the floor and my floor is definitely straight coz none of my four chairs or dining table has this issue. secondly the accessory button on it is loose, it seems its going to come off soon. In short a product not worth investing your money and time on. Extremely dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sultan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Easily assembled! We were pleased with quality and price. It seems to be well made and looks like it would be very expensive. The height and width and the length were perfect for our queen bed. Looks great at the foot of our bed and it is a wonderful addition to the bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: RhondaB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Looks Very Expensive. Sturdy. Easy To Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this bench. Everyone thinks we spent a lot more for this bench than we did. Beautiful entry bench. Sturdy. Easy to assemble. Classic style. Looks very expensive. My brother paid a lot more for the entry bench he bought for his new house, (not this one), and my mom said that ours looks a lot better than his, and that ours seems better made than his. My husband uses ours to take his shoes on and off by the front door. We bought the black leather/dark wood looking one, and we love it. We would definitely recommend. We would definitely buy this one again. 5 stars. 🌟
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I paid $67 each for two of these. I didn't know what to expect for that price, but Ashley Furniture is usually pretty great so I went for it. I was astonished at the quality! First, the benches were packed beautifully. They are a very nice quality wood, solid and heavy. I was surprised that it took me about 10 minutes per bench to get them set up, amazing! I'm using these instead of the chairs that came with my 20 year old dining room table and they fit perfectly. I am very happy with them! They are firm yet very comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K Lamel

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, functional bench
customer_reviews.text: Solid bench, looks exactly like the photo, assembly is simply screwing on the legs with the provided hardware and allen wrench. Not super cushy, but soft enough, and quite comfortable. The height is also comfortable; tall enough for an adult, but also good for my 8 year old. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Coriesu

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty sturdy, but noticed some stain around one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally opened the box and assembled the bench. Seems pretty sturdy, but noticed some stain around one of the buttons. Tried to clean with a damp cloth, but it didnt help. I hope manufacturer can recommend me some cleaner. I would not want to return it if the stain can be removed. Attached is the picture. Hard to see in the picture, but in natural light, its clearly visible. If manufacturer is reading, please advise. A new bench should not come with stains.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for extra seating in our dining room when we have company, but use it most of the time behind our living room sofa, facing the front door when we come in. One can sit on it to put their shoes on and take them off. It also comes in handy for everyone to temporarily place their pocketbooks and other items when coming in and going out. It's very nice looking and sturdy. It was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE DIRECTIONS WERE FOLLOWED AND I REALLY APPRECIATE IT.
customer_reviews.text: THIS BENCH IS VERY AFFORDABLE AND SO NICE TO HAVE. I HAVE MINE AT THE FOOT OF THE BED AND IS GREAT TO BE ABLE TO SIT DOWN AND PUT SHOES AND SOCKS ON. WE PURCHASED ONE FOR OUR GRANDDAUGHTER ALYSSA. SHE LIVES IN FLORIDA AND SHE GOT A NEW GUITAR FROM SANTA AND SHE LOVES TO SIT AND PLAY. THE ON LINE SHOPPING MAKES IT SO EASY AND WHEN YOUR FAMILY LIVES OUT OF TOWN IT IS PRICELESS. WITH AMAZON PRIME THERE IS NO SHIPPING MAKES IT SO NICE. THANKS.
customer_reviews.author: BERTHA GRUPENHOF

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. IT WAS DAMAGED IN SHIPPING BUT I HAD ALREADY PUT IT TOGETHER BEFORE I NOTICED IT, AFTER TAKING THE WRAPPING OFF THE CUSHION, THE CORNER WAS SMASHED IN AND THE PARTICLE WOOD IN THE SEAT WAS EXPOSED AND THE FABRIC WAS TORN WIT SOME STUFFING COMING OUT. THE BOX DID HAVE A SMASHED CORNER ALSO. BUT I BROKE OFF THE PIECE MAKING A LITTLE ROOM AND STITCHED THE FABRIC WHICH WAS HARD BECAUSE IT THINNER 'PLEATHER' AND IT WANTED TO TEAR THROUGH BUT I GOT IT TO WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Large white mark on the bench. Not even unboxed yet.
customer_reviews.text: I am just unwrapping the bench. Seemed like a great deal but there is an strange large white mark on the corner of the top of the bench. I tried to wipe it off with a warm wet cloth and it doesn’t go away. I’m not sure what to do next! Buyers be ware!!! ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Bjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Broken with-in a week.
customer_reviews.text: One of the 5 buttons on top, one of the pop-ed off with-in the 1st week of receiving the order. There was no undue usage, we simply sit on it, nothing more. I missed the return window by 2 days, (That's my own fault, with all the craziness due to the Covid-19 lock down) and now I am stuck with a broken bench that is an eye sore. I would advise against buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: WhopVillian

customer_reviews.title: Loose Buttons
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench to add to my dinning table set when we have extra guests. I have had this bench for one month. The tuffted buttons on the top of the bench have already snapped off. My husbands jeans apparently loosen them as he was reaching for food accross the table. Bummer because I wanted to get a second bench and I will not be purchasing another with buttons.
customer_reviews.author: KaGu

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This Ashley furniture dining bench is absolutely beautiful and extremely sturdy. I must admit for the price, I was expecting to be underwhelmed but my husband and I were tremendously impressed. It came packaged very protectively. The assembly took under 5 minutes. The rich dark wood and the black leather-like top goes so well with our Ashley table and chairs. High quality at an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: JMN

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and feels sturdy but...
customer_reviews.text: The bench looks nice and feel sturdy but within a very short amount of time, like a week, it had damage. Now the damage is minor, however continuing to fix it is irritating and, as it is where you sit, can not be ignored. The “button” design on the top pops off. It is not easy to get back on and never looks good. After doing it so many times I have just taped it down- which obviously looks horrible. So if you don’t want that look, either don’t let people sit on the bench or just skip this one for a bench without “buttons”. I sure wish I had. Best. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Product is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and the look of this product. Works perfect in a guest bedroom as a bench or a suitcase holder. Only issue I had was the center cross bar under the bench was broken from shipping. My husband was able to fix it so no need to send back. The packaging should not have the hardware and legs tied underneath where the wood cross bar is as that is what caused the bar to break during shipping. The legs boxed wasn't secured enough so it jostled around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: is beautiful and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This bench, is beautiful and very sturdy. I assembled it (attaching the legs) in 15 minutes, no tools required (small wrench provided). It arrived in 1 week in perfect condition. Best of all, the price was phenomenal and shipping was free. I have been searching for a long time, and similar benches in my local furniture stores cost twice as much. I am using it for additional seating at my dining room table...no more folding chairs-hurrah!
customer_reviews.author: Rae Ann Hareid

customer_reviews.title: Wobble
customer_reviews.text: The product looks nice but after assembly, it wobbles. The legs seem to be equally cut, but the placement of the screwholes may be off. I tried multiple switching of the legs (...timewasting) to see if it will balance out and did not work. I will try to manage the balance, I guess, by buying a "floor protector", for lack of a better word to describe it, to place under the "short leg". I am not much of returning orders due to the hassles of shipping things back. Disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made heavy duty bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is very well made and heavy construction. Super easy to put together as only have to attach the legs. I have another one exactly like this that I purchased form Ashley several years ago and it is still in great shape & sturdy as ever. Legs don't crack or break like some of the other ones I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: SALLY WYATT

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smell
customer_reviews.text: This thing is easy to assemble and pretty comfy. The reason I give it 2 stars is because it gives off awful toxic smell that really stinks up my large dining room. It was so cheap that it's not worth it to take it apart and send it back, but I'll leave it in my sun room to air it out for who knows how long, until the smell is gone, or only take it out to use it occasionally if the smell persists.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Xing

customer_reviews.title: the look and feel of quality
customer_reviews.text: as soon as i started to unpackage it i was stunned at how well it was packged. they provided everything to put it together, and putting it together was super simple. i use this at the foot of my bed as a dressing bench and it dresses up my bedroom. it is a sturdy good looking piece of furniture. this has the look and feel of quality, you most certainly cant go wrong with this one for the price and the value.
customer_reviews.author: james barron

customer_reviews.title: Almost a great bench.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy bench that was easy to put together other than a couple holes being off. I would love this bench if it hadn’t arrived with small holes and something under the leather poking up. There is no number to call for replacement parts with the manufacturer and unless I want to take this apart and reassemble the box and mail this thing back to Amazon, I’m left with few other options.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but wobbly bench
customer_reviews.text: This fits our dining table perfectly. It was easy to assemble and seems relatively sturdy for the price. The faux leather should hold up to light use. But - the legs are not the same length and it wobbles terribly. It's severe enough that the addition of felt pads didn't eliminate the wobble - just calmed it to tolerable levels.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vilches

customer_reviews.title: These benches are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: When searching for a bench, these were exactly what I was looking for! They are sturdy and very well manufactured. I bought two and I am considering purchasing more! They are worth every penny! Easy to clean and perfect for the kids! They have some type of memory foam and are very comfortable. I would highly recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Norton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy bench at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I had no damage. The item came earlier than listed and it only took me 10 minutes to put it together which was basically screwing in the legs with the tool/supplies provided. It would’ve been less time; however, I was talking on the phone while putting it together. A quality product at a great price. I was pleasantly pleased. Some of the reviews will deter you but I wonder if these customers are opting for used products instead of new.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha J

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a workout bench - it's sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great value for your money so far. It feels and looks much more expensive and I'm positive that it'll keep for a very long time. Not much else you can ask for from an indoors bench. I put a lot of weight on it since I use it for weightlifting and it hasn't had any problems at all. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vinson Z

customer_reviews.title: Half Price and Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Ashley Haddigan Dining Table and Chairs directly from Ashley furniture. At the time I passed on the bench. I bought two of these Ashley Haddigan benches from OJCommerce for the same price as Ashley wanted for one. . The benches came free shipping, and they came overnight through FedEx! I looked at OJCommerce's feedback rating. it was 100% positive with over 4200 sales within the last three months. The benches are a steal at this price and they are in perfect condition. and they match my other items. I'm Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Video Paul

customer_reviews.title: I'm getting the whole set
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing, I've always wanted a table with a bench. Buying the pieces to this set was so much cheaper than buying it in store. The bench is solid and could not have been easier to put together. The brown seat material will probably start to show wear after a while but I still love it
customer_reviews.author: Kamodo127

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bench seat for dining room!
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe I got such a beautiful bench for the price! The bench is well made, and perfect for my 123" dining room table. The bench that actually goes with this table is over $400. I am so happy I didnt purchase that bench and found this one on AMAZON that looks like it is supposed to go with my table. And I was able to make an informed decision by the pictures on AMAZON. I actually save over $300 by buying this Ashley's bench. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: So glad I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This bench is very sturdy, the seat is black but with maybe a slight hint of charcoal, just very slight though. The wood is an espresso color. Goes very well with my bedroom set. It is a great purchase and if you’re on the fence I say go for it, you won’t regret it! Looks more expensive than it was...
customer_reviews.author: Kim A.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bench for a year now and it has held up great. It is very sturdy and can comfortably fit 2 large adults. We use it as a dining bench and the espresso color matched perfectly. The upholstery has withstood against 2 very messy toddlers and pets. It easily wipes clean. My only qualm is that a few of the button details have become loose, but I'm sure that can easily be stitched or glued back on. Overall great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bench at a great price!  You won’t be disappointed.  Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bench. For the price it is a great value. I wondered how sturdy it would be. It is great, very sturdy and the cushion is comfortable. It is by my front door so I can sit to put shoes and boots on. I’m very impressed with the quality and very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Shea

customer_reviews.title: Easily fits 3
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my dinning table from Ashley’s furniture I skipped on the bench and decided to go with 4 chairs instead since the original package was for 2 chairs and the bench. (1 bench cost as much as 2 chairs) Now this is a much better deal, it is the exact bench that goes with my table/chairs and this time it was less than 50% what it would have cost me in store.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!  See photos.
customer_reviews.text: We have a tall captain’s bed. I bought this so our 12 pound dog could get on and off the bed by herself. My husband also likes to sit on it while putting on his socks. It is attractive for the price point. The material has been very sturdy, there are no scratches from dog nails. Easy to assemble. This could also be used for extra seating at the table when company visits. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Putting it together was a breeze. The bench itself is very sturdy. I have had mine for a couple weeks now and it has held up fine and I don't have any concerns that it wont hold up just fine for years to come. And this is coming from a mom of boys and large dog owner. Great addition to my dining room table
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, color off
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy and good price. The only negative is the cushion is a dull dark gray instead of a shiny dark brown. Got it to fill an area in my entry way, it’s fits perfectly and fortunately our floor has brown and gray in it.
customer_reviews.author: VivLA

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, well built.Only requires that you attach the legs. I use this under the window for my dogs to look out so they'll stay off the back of my couch. Its held up well to their nails, although being leather it shows scuffs from their nails.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great in looks and sturdiness!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this bench. I use it at the side of my high bed for two purposes: 1) to sit on to aid in dressing, and 2) to help my aging dog get on the bed. (I have tried steps of various styles, but he will not use them.) This piece is attractive and well-made. I am happy I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love this  bench!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a bench to add to my new table. I wanted extra seating but wanted something that I could put up against the wall when I didn't need it for seating. My husband put this together and he said it was easy to assemble. It looks great in my kitchen. The colors match my table perfectly. The cushion is very firm and I like it. This is a great buy! I love the price and the product!
customer_reviews.author: MMV

customer_reviews.title: poor materials: the layers of thin veneer woods + screw/nail
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try this $70 (including tax) bench, but disappointed by the quality control and the materials. It is obvious that the product is shipped without the basic quality control in a hurry: it arrived with broken parts as photos show. The shipping box was not damaged. The material is made by the layer of thin veneer woods. This tells me ... it won't last long, the combination of the layers of veneer woods and the nails.
customer_reviews.author: peppersalt

customer_reviews.title: This was just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to buy a couple of chairs for our dining table, and went with a dining bench instead. The product arrived really quickly and was assembled with in a half hour. It's very easy to put together. Very sturdy, comfortable, and depending on the size of the people you can fit up to three people on a dining bench. I am really happy with this product and recommend it as a substitute for dining chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Tarica Kilmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench, but side rail cracked (box undamaged)
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed to see the side rail is cracked. The box is in perfect condition, so I’m guessing it was put together with cracked board before shipping. I desperately need for my 82 year old father to sit at end of his bed, so I will not be messing with shipping it back
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I saw this bench set up with a set of 4 chairs and a table. The furniture store upped the price significantly so we started searching this item out along with the chairs and table. This bench was delivered yesterday. It was super simple to put together and looks absolutely fantastic! I’m very pleased with our purchase!! The delivery was fast and the price point was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: It took 15 minutes to assemble. 4 legs and 8 screws... Good quality and good craftsmanship. Vietnam is up an coming in consumer goods manufacturing. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: lofty

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: great price, looks nice. But of the 10 or so screws holding the bench to the legs, 3 of them fell out on arrival. 2 can be screwed back in but 1 couldn't from the cross threading. Overall still a good buy. Time will tell if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Chao

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for that price, overall good quality. My cat left a few scratches already, material is a bit sensitive but maybe would've happened with real leather as well. But at least wasn't hundreds of dollars. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buttons come off easily
customer_reviews.text: Looked great until 3 months after having it the buttons are broken already. I do not have young children or anything. So this is sad it didn’t last. They are not an easy fix. Very diappointed.
customer_reviews.author: brandy`

customer_reviews.title: great work out bench
customer_reviews.text: It not only looks nice, but is a good quality for the price. We use ours to hold pillows at night from the bed. It is sturdy for seating as well I also used it today as a work out bench! It had great padding
customer_reviews.author: happy.

customer_reviews.title: Nice to Look At
customer_reviews.text: I use this in front of a sofa to use as a foot stool or coffee table. When working on projects I spread out and organize on this. When I have a computer project I pull it over for students to sit on so they can see the. computer. I have no complaints whatsoever. It is very pleasing to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Sher Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, very easy to put together, and looks great. My 4 kids fit on one bench and three full size adults fit comfortably on the other. We've had them more than a month now and they don't seem like they'll wear much at all
customer_reviews.author: TLC4

customer_reviews.title: Faux leather lasts only a year.
customer_reviews.text: The product is really good but the faux leather can't stand long. Within a year, it started to chip and wear and tear is very apparent.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fermin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this bench. It was easy to assemble and looked nice in my dining room. However, within a few days of use the buttons started popping off of the seat. I've had the bench at my home for around a week now and 3 out of 5 buttons have popped off with no clear way to reattach them. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great Dining Bench!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this dining room bench to compliment our six foot long table. It's nice to have extra seating for 2 to 3 people. When the bench is not in use, we push the table to cover the bench. The dark wood and black upholstered seat matched so well. It was easy to assemble and is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Despite a totally intact box, there was a half inch by one inch chunk chipped off a corner when we unboxed it. I was able to glue it back in place and it doesn’t seem to be an issue now, but definitely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Meg D.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: So angry I didn't order two at the sale price. This is a great bench that I bought as a gift but I really wanted to keep for myself. Very well made and eye appealing. Couldn't have been more pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb T., Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Truly Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Ever open a box and just get a bad vibe? This is a bad vibe bench. The price reflects the quality. It looks cheap don't try to fool yourself. oh yeah As you can see in the photo and video the bench arrived with one leg dramatically shorter than the others...not much more to say about that.
customer_reviews.author: JNM

customer_reviews.title: Damage
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this at all . Item come on time , but it was a big tear at the corner , that didn’t mention or describe in product detail . So disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: NEO T. HAK

customer_reviews.title: 3 months before it loses is beauty
customer_reviews.text: The Buttons are slightly worrying but it was super easy to put together and perfect for the price. Update : Today is 6-20-2018 , I ordered on Ordered on March 11, 2018, and the leather is discoloring and the buttons do somewhat pop off although they do pop back on.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten so many compliments on this bench. It really makes the landing spot at my front door look like a proper entryway. Very sturdy as my husband sits here each day to put on and remove his work boots while the children (including a big dog) jump all over him. Incredibly happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Starduster

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy for a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this bench. My table is oval shaped so I was a little worried with how it would look but it goes with it perfectly. It can set two adults, or three children at a time. It was super easy to put together and is incredibly sturdy. We are considering purchasing another one to replace two more chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Saph&Steph

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! Better price!! I got three for my triangular kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: Emilsam Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Badly placed staples and screws break through cushion
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice looking bench but it made my child bleed. There are staples and screws underneath that stab up into the cushion. Now every time the sit or kneel they get stabbed. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a seat in the kitchen along one side of the table for larger guests who want some comfort on their bottom. It took me ten minutes to out on the legs. The padding is comfy and it holds a lot of weight. We put almost 800 pounds on it between a few people and it didn't even make so much as a creaking noise. Strong. Real strong.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and love how it looked but after a month of use the material that you sit on is peeling off and falling apart with small a amount of usage. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Right after buying one of these benches, putting it together, and trying it out I immediately purchased another one. IT is comfortable, the perfect height for our table, it's versatile and looks good in a kitchen, a hallway, or a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Seller knowingly sold me a defective returned product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking bench and will work for what I need. However, this was obviously returned to the seller as a defective product. The package had previously been opened and probably noticing the same thing we did - that the screws that hold the cushion on are stripped and the cushion is not attached properly - was returned. We are disappointed in the dishonesty, by packaging it back up to resell.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Mogen

customer_reviews.title: Big sturdy bench - would comfortably seat 2 adults or 3 kids...nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the foot of my king size bed as the "faux" leather matched my leather headboard nicely. I put it together in less than 30 min. Highly recommend you use an electric screwdriver with an allenhead to assemble as the tiny little tool they send works but is 10 times the effort. All pieces came in perfect condition. Looks nice. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: charm hartland

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality of fabric
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this bench because of a tear in the fabric and ordered a replacement. I was extremely disappointed when the replacement bench I received also had a tear in the fabric. Its difficult to return such a large item, so I kept the second bench concluding all of these benches may have tears or defects. The bench is inexpensive, but disappointing to receive two torn products. I had to super glue the tear to prevent it from getting worse. Don't order this bench....odds are it will be torn or defective.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu2

customer_reviews.title: Color not as described
customer_reviews.text: We are using it at the foot of a king sized bed. It is sturdy and quite nice BUT the top is gray, not dark brown as described. All of the furniture is dark brown. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: This seat, along with another one the same, arrived yesterday morning by UPS. I had them both put together within 30 minutes. They're really sturdy and strong. I have osteoarthritis in both hands and bone on bone in my right wrist but I still managed to put them together easily. They look great each side of my table and seem to be really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Faux leather seat looked cheap but I figured for the price it was worth it. Then two of the tufted buttons came off days after assembly. No way to really repair them without extensive time/effort and reupholstered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and good length
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a new dinette set for the kitchen but were very disappointed in the length of the bench. We ordered this to replace it and it works perfectly!! Now we can fit 3 grandkids at the table using this new bench and they love sitting on it instead of a chair. Very sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: JFallin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bench good price
customer_reviews.text: These benches are heavy and should hold up well under my heavy set family, the top is padded , comfy, wipes clean. We bought three one to replace two chairs on our dining table that didn’t last and two for two of our bedrooms for seating, great price
customer_reviews.author: Deneen Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is exactly what I was looking for to be placed at the end of my king-size bed. It's very well made, very sturdy and a great value for the money! The faux leather on the seat is tufted in a dark brown matte finish. And the stain on the legs compliments the expresso stain of my bedroom furniture perfectly. Assembly took no time at all - the allen wrench and screws were included in the package to attach the 4 legs to the seat. Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: Gramma D

customer_reviews.title: It’s a must for benches
customer_reviews.text: Oh it’s such a clean look I have it at the foot of my king bed and it’s nice very upscale and presentable i does a great job at filling the space without taking the space if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal c

customer_reviews.title: Solid, attractive, good quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I couldn't find anything even close. Minutes to assemble, and looks/ feels great with my table. I am a pretty average sized human, no heavy use yet.
customer_reviews.author: ky

customer_reviews.title: I love this bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. It works great at my dining room table and looks really really great. There were no scratches rips or tears and it was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This bench fit perfectly in our entryway. The wood is beautiful and very sturdy (a deep, dark wood), and the top has held up very against our 3 small children. Great piece of furniture at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: mackandbifftay

customer_reviews.title: Quick assembly and great structure!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this, for the price this bench is amazing and so sturdy! I love it! a little larger than expected but thats perfect for us. I really love it and its so chic!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M

customer_reviews.title: Grat Item
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great. Only thing I didn't like was everything being stapled to the underside of the bench - which was a pain to pull all the staples out. Other than that - this was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, sturdy, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to add seating to my dining room table - so I could squeeze 3 kids in the place of where 2 chairs would normally go. I love this! It's comfortable, sturdy and easy to wipe clean. Perfect for families!
customer_reviews.author: Maren Rock

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice out of box but within 48 hours two of the buttons fell off leaving metal part showing. Very much regret this purchase- don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and straightforward assembly. Compliments existing table and chairs. Perfect for multiple small kids to allow additional seating for larger individuals around the table. Comfortable as well!
customer_reviews.author: China

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the length, height and color we needed for Anand me down dining room ser we got that was missing 2 chairs. Really nice looking in person and comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: matthew h shannon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!!! Have been waiting patiently to find the perfect bench to match our dining room table....finally! Great quality! Easy to put together! Sturdy and gorgeous!!!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: KP123

customer_reviews.title: Best deal ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice piece of furniture! A snap to put together, comfy, great colors, nice size (length & height). The kids were pretty happy with it, no one wanted to sit on the regular chairs! I did put felt gliders on the legs to protect my tile floors but otherwise PERFECT! Still cant believe the price
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: doesn't take up a lot of room and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: An employee asked for a bench for outside of their office as a chair would stick out to fast. I found this one that had good ratings and seemed to fit the bill. It was easy to assemble, came quickly and the employee was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Great materials
customer_reviews.text: The men who delivered this bench actually assembled it first. Wow! It became great extra seating during the holidays. Very sturdy. Works well with other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: JACKI  PETERSON

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bench. I was a little afraid of the quality when I ordered it, but it is well finished, sturdy and looks great at the foot of our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money awesome bench
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid bench. One of the best things i bought so far for my new home. Bought it to put infront of my bed for when i get dressed in the AM. went well with my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Irv P

product_meta.title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Ralene Dining Room Bench - Rectangular - Vintage Casual - Medium Brown
product_meta.description: Color:Ralene Dining BenchWith a rich rustic beauty that is sure to transform the atmosphere of any dining area, the “Ralene” dining collection features a distressed and burnished dark brown finish beautifully complemented by the comfortable faux leather upholstered chair and bench seats.
feature_bullets: UPHOLSTERED DINING BENCH: This wood dining bench is rustic style refined. Tufted faux leather upholstery looks chic in a dark hue

PLUSH CUSHION: This dining table bench is inviting with smooth faux leather upholstery over a thickly cushioned seat. It's sure to be your new favorite seat in the house. Plus, clean-up is super simple

RICH COLORS: Bench seat is upholstered in a rich brown faux leather that complements the medium tone of the chair legs and base. Frame is made with select acacia veneers, wood and engineered wood in a burnished finish
CASUAL SEATING: Extra long dining bench is great for seating multiple guests at casual get-togethers. Measures 49.75" W x 15.5"D x 19" H
EASY ASSEMBLY: Easy-to-follow instructions, hardware and tools included
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget. Since 1945

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,811 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
